column4: hey.. i've recently set up samba shares and can view the shares on my XP box... _but_... it looks as if the files are writable, but i'm sure that's not safe as they are on ntfs
you are accessing 'shares' on a xp machine?
if they are on a XP box  - then they are written to by the XP os :P and thus should be safe.
if its a ntfs 'drive' that is shared by linux .. then Linux is doing the read/writing - and you do NOT want linux to be writing to them.
